document_data.name: Kromnlor Sernar
document_data.mainbody: '''Kromnlor Sernar''' was a [[sage]] and midwife inhabiting [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kromnlor rented a room at an [[inn]] called [[Warm Beds]] located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] where [[Presper Street]] met [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5308b}} She could typically be found there early in the morning or late at night. She specialized in nature lore, specifically [[fungi]] and [[herb]]s of the [[Sword Coast]], [[north Faer√ªn]], and the [[Heartlands]]. She wandered the Dock Ward providing services as a midwife to those in need, clashing frequently with the [[Guild of Apothecaries & Physicians]] who did not appreciate her effective use of herbal remedies.
